attributes.action: ask the Queen to plan to mark her Diamond Jubilee and the London Olympics in 2012 by the conversion of Buckingham Palace into the Louvre of London to permanently show the "Royal" art collections of which only a fraction is currently viewable by the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent loans by Her Majesty to the Rembrandt and Holbein exhibitions of pictures which are not usually seen by the public underlined how much of wonderful and historical art we are missing. 
I have heard that the royal family much prefer Windsor. What a legacy this would leave in memory of all concerned!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
